item.title: Amuri Arts Council Autumn School
item.desc:
Dates: 17 - 19 MAY 2013 Location: Hanmer Springs
The Autumn School is held annually in Hanmer Springs.
The aim of the school is "to bring into the Amuri area tutors expert in their field, and for participants to enjoy a weekend of making and renewing friendships while increasing their diversity of skills and with an understanding of arts and crafts not normally available in the district."
We have a number of new and exciting courses for the 2013 Autumn School:
* Acrylic and oil painting with Rob McDowell * Advanced photography with Simon Woolf * Basic book binding by hand with (Jan) Yinghua Jiang * Beginners photography with David Wethey * Cheese making with Kimberli Schuitman * Creative writing with Frankie McMillan and Kerrin P Sharpe * Embrodiery with Jane van Keulen * Game food with Philippe Meyer * Knitting with Julia Standfield * Paverpol sculpture with Glenis Miller * Singing with Valerie Wycoff and Jim Lovell Smith * Watercolour painting with Clark Esplin
Amuri Community Arts Council Contact: Sue Harris
